column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First time trying this place out! I read the past reviews on how pack it gets in the morning
column2: so I arrived at 8:40 and there was a few people already waiting. They opened the doors at 9
column3: and the service was fast. I ordered the chocolate croissant
column6: pain perdu (not all for me). The food was so good! I would recommend this bakery to anyone! Service was so friendly and cheery
column7: the ambiance was so cute and modern
column8: and food was delicious. I can't wait to return!
